game.name: Serafina and the Key to the Egg
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: After receiving a challenge which could determine the future of her village, if not the whole world, Serafina sets out for the city of Mirado. There she will have to do anything she can to take part in auction to win treasure of great power, the Key to the Egg.
game.shortDescriptionEn: After receiving a challenge which could determine the future of her village, if not the whole world, Serafina sets out for the city of Mirado. There she will have to do anything she can to take part in auction to win treasure of great power, the Key to the Egg.
